location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Rough Sketch of the attack on the Batteries of MOHUMRA by the combined Naval and Military Forces under command of Lt. Genl Sir James Outram. March 26th. 1857.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 209 x 338mm, on sheet 244 x 484mm

mods.abstract: The map shows a region around Mohumra [Khorramshahr] in south-western Persia, indicating the positions and movements of British warships and troops, and the locations of Persian camps and gun batteries. The map also indicates hydrology, vegetation and settlements.The map is Plate 4 in 'Persian Gulf and Gulf of Oman' (Naval Intelligence Department No. 694), 1903, and is 'Reproduced from "Outrams Persian Campaign 1857"'.A printing statement reads, 'Weller & Graham, Ltd. Litho, London.'.
